__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Ore Vein Tweaks

pages.text: Ore veins seem too difficult to find, so why not make it a bit easier? Some of the current veins were too small and too rare.$(br2)Coal veins are now much larger horizontal discs with fewer inclusions. Most other mineral veins are larger and more common, but occur at the same depths.

$(bold)Ore Veins on the Brink$()$(br2)Exploring the depths and heights of the world may be more rewarding! New veins below y-level 0 now exist for all metamorphic and igneous intrusive ores: metal, mineral, and diamonds/emeralds. These veins may be larger, denser, and purer.$(br2)In the mountains, new dense iron, copper and sulfur veins spawn.
